urls.title: Baggage transfers and flight connections | Jetstar
urls.description: If you have a connecting connecting domestic and international flight, here's everything you need to know about your checked baggage.

data.text: @YoYogAnnie Hi Annie, thanks for reaching out. We are unable to transfer baggage between flights however, there are some exceptions. To know more about baggage transfer and flight connections, you may visit - https://t.co/Ui3b7SmlfU. I hope it helps. - Paul

urls.title: Can I pack that? - Dangerous Goods App - Search
urls.description: Are the items you’re packing safe to fly? You are ultimately responsible for the items in your luggage. Make sure what you’re packing doesn’t pose a risk to you and your fellow passengers. The Can I pack that? Dangerous Goods App is designed to help inform you about what you can and can’t pack in your luggage. And, if it can be brought aboard, guide you on how to do it safely.

data.text: @mdalikazi Hi Ali, thanks for reaching out. Yes, passengers are allowed to carry a Motorcycle helmet as carry-on luggage. You may also check this link https://t.co/51qF6yts4m for more info. Thanks - Jeff

urls.title: Travel identification: domestic Australia and NZ flights | Jetstar
urls.description: Your guide to travel identification requirements when travelling with Jetstar on domestic flights within Australia and New Zealand.

data.text: @ashmoore69 1/2 or a document that identifies you. Please note that non-Australian passengers are required to show their passport. You can find out more about this here https://t.co/SCFgnQ9Bpl. Thanks - Jen
